testResults.name: Data Sovereignty Enforcement > enforceDataSovereignty > should block super admin from community data access (CRITICAL)
testResults.fix: Updated error message in auth.middleware.ts from 'Super admins cannot access community cultural data' to 'Super administrators cannot access community data'

testResults.name: Data Sovereignty Enforcement > requireCommunityAccess > should block super admin even if they somehow have communityId
testResults.fix: Same error message fix as above - all 11 data sovereignty tests now passing

testResults.name: Password Service Security Tests > Performance & Security Integration > should use secure random salts (no duplicates in 5 hashes)
testResults.fix: Added test-specific optimized argon2 parameters in TestConfigSchema: memory=32MB, iterations=2, parallelism=2. Test now passes in ~2.3 seconds instead of timing out.

testResults.name: Places API Routes - Integration Tests > POST /api/v1/places > should create a new place as admin
testResults.fix: Fixed database connection isolation issue by reverting to beforeEach setup. Issue was that beforeAll setup created data in one DB connection but test execution used a different connection, causing 'Community with ID 3 not found' error.

summary.critical_fixes: All major test failures resolved - data sovereignty, password performance, and database connection issues fixed
summary.remaining_issues: Test suite runs slower due to full database setup per test, but all functionality is working correctly
